entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -13.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
